resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103496</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103496</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206027</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">National Marine Sanctuary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nationales Marineschongebiet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sanctuaire Marin National</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sanctuary Marinho Nacional</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Santuario Marino Nazionale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εθνικό θαλάσσιο άδυτο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Santuario Marina Nacional</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides information about our nation's marine sanctuaries -- how they were established, how they're managed, their scientific and educational programs, and events that occur in them throughout the year. Within the 13 sites are a range of creatures, habitats, historical artifacts, and flourishing maritime cultures.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt Informationen über Marineschongebiete 
unserer Nation zur Verfügung -- wie sie, wie sie gehandhabt werden, 
ihre wissenschaftlichen und pädagogischen Programme und Fälle 
hergestellt wurden, die in ihnen während des Jahres auftreten. 
Innerhalb der 13 Sites sind eine Strecke der Geschöpfe, 
Lebensräume, historische Kunstprodukte und blühende Seekulturen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit des informations au sujet des sanctuaires 
marins de notre nation -- comment elles ont été établies, comment 
elles sont contrôlées, leurs programmes, et événements 
scientifiques et éducatifs qui se produisent dans eux tout au long de
l'année. Dans les 13 sites sont un intervalle des créatures, 
les habitats, les objets façonnés historiques, et les cultures 
maritimes d'épanouissement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece a informação sobre sanctuaries marinhos 
da nossa nação -- como foram estabelecidos, como são controlados, 
seus programas, e eventos científicos e educacionais que ocorrem 
neles durante todo o ano. Dentro dos 13 locais estão uma escala
das criaturas, os habitats, os artifacts históricos, e as culturas 
marítimas florescendo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce le informazioni sui santuari marini della
nostra nazione -- come sono stati stabiliti, come sono gestiti, i loro
programmi ed eventi scientifici ed educativi che si presentano in loro
durante l'anno. All'interno dei 13 luoghi sono una gamma di 
creature, gli habitat, i manufatti storici e le colture marittime 
fiorenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει τις πληροφορίες για τα θαλάσσια άδυτα του 
έθνους μας -- πώς καθιερώθηκαν, πώς ρυθμίζονται, τα επιστημονικά
και εκπαιδευτικά προγράμματά τους, και γεγονότα που εμφανίζονται 
σε τους καθ' όλη τη διάρκεια του έτους. Μέσα στις 13 
περιοχές είναι μια σειρά των πλασμάτων, των βιότοπων, των 
ιστορικών χειροποίητων αντικειμένων, και των ακμάζοντας θαλάσσιων
πολιτισμών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a la información sobre los santuarios
marinas de nuestra nación -- cómo ella fue establecida, cómo ella 
se maneja, sus programas, y acontecimientos científicos y educativos 
que ocurren en ellos a través del año. Dentro de los 13 sitios
están un rango de criaturas, los habitat, los artefactos históricos,
y las culturas marítimos que prosperan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206027</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103496</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/national-marine-sanctuary</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
